author: rooneg
msg: * STATUS: Vote for r20741 and r20743 and move to approved.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix minor bugs in svn2rss.py's calculation of the feed name and RSS filename.
(main): Store the absolutely path of the repository so that
calculations of things like the RSS filename can deal with input
(SVN2RSS.make_rss): Use the absolute path of the provided path so
that taking that path's basename is actually meaningful.
